short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds coquette bows to all headings on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Live your coquette dreams while browsing with this new extension. When enabled, this extension adds cute bows to the upper left corner of webpage headings to add cute accents to even the dullest of websites. 

Tired of the bows? No worries! Just click on the extension icon and toggle it off with the toggle button in the extension pop-up. Turn them back on whenever you want the same way and enjoy!
